optimize API reference¶

Models¶

class optimize.models.DeterministicModel(data, label=None)¶

Bases: optimize.models.Model

This class primarily serves as a trait with little additional functionality.

Base constructor for a model.

Parameters

  • data (Dataset) – The dataset for this model.

  • label (str, optional) – The label of this model.

class optimize.models.Model(data, label=None)¶

Bases: object

Base class for a model. This class provides a minimal api to work with the other objects. The model is assumed to hold an instance of the relevant data.

data¶

The dataset for this model.

Type

Dataset

label¶

The label of this model.

Type

str

Base constructor for a model.

Parameters

  • data (Dataset) – The dataset for this model.

  • label (str, optional) – The label of this model.

compute_data_errors(pars)¶

Default method to generate the data errors, which may be parametrized. Here the data a priori error bars are returned.

Parameters

pars (Parameters) – The parameters.

Returns

The data errors.

Return type

np.ndarray

compute_residuals(pars)¶

Default method to generate the residuals (data - model).

Parameters

pars (Parameters) – The parameters.

Returns

The residuals.

Return type

np.ndarray

class optimize.models.NoiseModel(data, det_model=None, noise_process=None, label=None)¶

Bases: optimize.models.Model

A base class for models composed of a deterministic model and a noise process.

det_model¶

The deterministic model.

Type

DeterministicModel

noise_process¶

The noise process.

Type

NoiseProcess

data¶

The dataset for this model.

Type

Dataset

label¶

The label of this model.

Type

str

Base constructor for a noise based model.

Parameters

  • det_model (DeterministicModel) – The deterministic model.

  • noise_process (NoiseProcess) – The noise process.

  • data (Dataset) – The dataset for this model.

  • label (str) – The label of this model.

compute_data_errors(pars, include_corr_error=False)¶

Default method to generate the data errors, which may be parametrized. Here the data a priori error bars are returned.

Parameters

pars (Parameters) – The parameters.

Returns

The data errors.

Return type

np.ndarray

compute_residuals(pars)¶

Default method to generate the residuals (data - model).

Parameters

pars (Parameters) – The parameters.

Returns

The residuals.

Return type

np.ndarray
